short_summary: Purchase dust control product for Cree airports of Waskaganish, Eastmain and Wemindji
description: RFQ for the acquisition of 36 totes of dust control product to be used on the gravel runways, taxiways and apron at the Cree airports of Waskaganish, Eastmain and Wemindji, including the pick up of 58 empty totes.
full_summary:
================

**Announcement: Request for Tender for Dust Control Products**
----------------------------------------------------------

**Bid Opportunity**
----------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Transport Canada, invites bids for the procurement of dust control products to be used on the gravel runways, taxiways, and apron at the Cree airports of Waskaganish, Eastmain, and Wemindji in Quebec.

**Project Overview**
-----------------

This tender is geared towards the provision of 36 totes of dust control product and the collection of 58 empty totes. This project aims to improve environmental sustainability in the short term, while paving the way for possible future infrastructure projects in the Cree Nation, in cooperation with Canada.

**Requirements**
-------------

*   A minimum of 36 totes of dust control product to be used on the gravel runways, taxiways, and apron at the Cree airports.
*   Collection of 58 empty totes.

**Administrative Requirements**
---------------------------

*   Bid submissions and all supporting documentation are due on 20-10-2022 at 14:00 (local time).
*   Late submissions will be declared non-responsive and will not be considered.
*   Price firmed on offer according to Section 23, Financial Estimates, CTA, R 5D Physical.
*   Pursuant to the tenth edition of the Canadian Institute of Transportation Engineer’s September 1993 agreement terms, any increase to the vendor invoice that is greater than three percent will not be accepted for the remainder of this project term.

**Notice**
--------
